title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 195.9 - Permits for authorized signs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 195.9 - Permits for authorized signs

State Regulations
(a) Permits shall be on standard forms provided by the department. (b) All permits shall be subject to review
and may be revoked by the department whenever, pursuant to such permit, a sign, structure or device has been erected or is being maintained in violation of
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
195.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
